column4: hi! I kind of screwed my firefox while trying to upgrade to firefox 1.5. My  configured apt repository doesn't work (is offline or something), where can I find a list of repositories and a sources.list file?
http://pastebin.com/453942   <- can someone help me resolve this? I'm trying to upgrade to draper, but the dist-upgrade process was stopped by this error
maybe you should uninstall mplayer, continue with the upgrade, then re-install mplayer.
yeah, I've just uninstalled it (together with some other stuff), and the upgrade process started again (by itself)
